laser_bullet.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.

00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !                        TRAVELLING PONDEROMOTIVE FORCE
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fpond for propagating laser field
00007 !
00008 ! ==================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine laser_bullet(t,x0,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,x,y,z,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon)
00011 
00012   implicit none
00013   real, intent(in) :: t ! time laser on
00014   real, intent(in) :: x0 ! pulse centre
00015   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration
00016   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00017   real, intent(in) :: sigma ! pulse width (1/e)
00018   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00019   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; distance from laser centre (x0,0,0)
00020 
00021   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00022 
00023   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, Ypon, Zpon, gamma, atten, theta
00024   real :: r, pi=3.141592654, phi, chi, a02
00025 
00026   !  sin^2 time envelope
00027 
00028   phi = pi*x/tpulse/2.
00029   Rpon = exp((-y**2-z**2)/sigma**2)  ! Gaussian radial profile
00030 
00031   if (x.ge.-tpulse .and. x.lt.tpulse) then
00032      xf = -pi/4.*sin(2*phi)
00033      Xpon = cos(phi)**2
00034   else
00035      xf = 0.
00036      Xpon = 0.
00037   endif
00038 
00039   yf = -2*y/sigma**2
00040   zf = -2*z/sigma**2
00041 
00042   a02 = vosc**2
00043   phipon = a02*Xpon*Rpon  ! intensity
00044 
00045   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon)/2.)  ! relativistic phi_pond
00046 
00047   Epon_x = a02*Rpon/gamma*xf
00048   Epon_y = a02*Xpon*Rpon/gamma*yf
00049   Epon_z = a02*Xpon*Rpon/gamma*zf
00050 
00051 end subroutine laser_bullet
